title: Admin-only navigation entry for Profile Management

requirements.summary: Add an admin-only "Profile Management" navigation item in AppShell that links to /admin?tab=profiles, shows in desktop and mobile menus, and is highlighted as active on that URL.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in as an admin and onboarded, the main navigation shows a clickable "Profile Management" entry.
Clicking "Profile Management" navigates to `/admin?tab=profiles` and the Admin Dashboard opens with the "Profiles" tab selected.
The "Profile Management" entry is present and tappable in the mobile menu sheet as well as visible in the desktop navigation (consistent with existing menu behavior).
When the current route is `/admin?tab=profiles`, the "Profile Management" menu entry is visually indicated as active.
Non-admin users never see the "Profile Management" menu entry.

file_operations.description: Add a new admin-only menu item labeled "Profile Management" that navigates to `/admin` with `search: { tab: 'profiles' }`, ensuring it is included in the existing admin-gated menu items list (same visibility rules as current admin items). Ensure active-route highlighting works for `/admin?tab=profiles` by leveraging the existing admin+tab matching logic in `isActiveRoute`, and confirm it renders in both desktop navigation and the mobile sheet menu via the existing `visibleMenuItems` mapping. Keep all labels in English and do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
